actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the pretrial release of any person charged with an act of aggravated terrorism.

summary.text: Directs that an individual charged with an act of terrorism be detained pending trial if a judicial officer determines that release would pose a danger to any other person or to the community. Deems an act of terrorism a dangerous crime for purposes of the pretrial release provisions of the District of Columbia Code and establishes a person's being charged with such an act as a rebuttable presumption that no conditions placed on his release could reasonably assure the safety of others and the community.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the pretrial release of any person charged with an act of aggravated terrorism.
